skins.selfIntroduction: I'm the third ship of the K?nigsberg-class light cruisers, K?ln. Our slender bodies are something that we're all very proud of. I once circumnavigated the world, and participated in operations in the Baltic Sea and North Sea. You can count on me for any type of operations, defense or assault!
skins.acquisition: You seem like a wise Commander. I'm K?ln. Please rest assured and let me take care of your work.
skins.login: Welcome back, Commander. Here is today's schedule. Please look it over.
skins.details: Commander, what kind of data are you looking for?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Ah... We went over budget again this month...
skins.secretaryIdle2: K?nigsberg, stop teasing the Commander! Be careful or you might just awaken some weird fetish of his...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Karlsruhe, Commander is very busy right now. Can't you stop bothering him and just play by yourself?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander... You realize that harrassing one's subordinates is despicable, right?

skins.shipDescription: Hmm... I feel like I can work even more efficiently than before. Commander, please rest assured, I will never betray your expectations.
skins.acquisition: Hmm... I feel like I can work even more efficiently than before. Commander, please rest assured, I will never betray your expectations.
skins.login: Today's task list. I've taken the liberty of sorting them in order of priority. Please review them.
skins.details: Data aside, if there's anything else you'd like to know, please don't hesitate to ask.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Detailed planning ensured the efficient completion of one's work. Commander, next on the list is¨D¨D
skins.secretaryIdle2: Such desk work demands a quiet and peaceful atmosphere. Well, I suppose that means I should hope my sisters don't come barging in...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, what would you say to coming by the Tactical Classroom to observe some lessons in your free time?
skins.secretaryTouch: Don't you have more important things to be doing than staring at me or chatting with me?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: ...From time to time, one should consider the rumors spreading around the port about oneself, Commander...
